name: Spirit of dungeon
description:
The spirit of the dungeon is a game with elements of bagel and RPG, it has 15 prepared levels and quite cool game mechanics, several types of enemies, things, and there is a hero leveling with various things. Beautiful pixel graphics, and high difficulty passing levels. 2 challenging bosses and an unexpected ending! 15 harvested levels
2 bosses
Beautiful graphics
Hero leveling
Several types of enemies
Cool mechanics
Difficulty passing [/ h2]
